## Pivot data

### Wide format




::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
pivot_wider(names_from = year, values_from = percent)
```
:::





### Long format




::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
pivot_longer(-name, names_to = "year", values_to = "n")
```
:::
